dict.acceptation: 适当，相当地；公平地；完全，简直；清楚地；

sent.orig: Mr. Bumble was fairly taken by surprise, and fairly beaten.
sent.trans: 班布尔先生吃的这一惊非同小可，挨的这顿打也真够瞧的。

sent.orig: We did fairly well but only fairly well.
sent.trans: 我们做得还过得去，但也仅仅是过得去而已。

sent.orig: Despite its European heritage, this system of providing health care would look fairly familiar to Americans.
sent.trans: 尽管是欧洲的遗产，但这个保健系统美国人相当熟悉。

sent.orig: The system of invoking authority stipulates that the country civil servant authority fairly.
sent.trans: 权力运行制度规范国家公职人员公正地行使权力。

sent.orig: It is a fairly mature development zone.
sent.trans: 是一个比较成熟的开发区。
